Carmel.The Village of WestClay: Located in Carmel, Indiana, a suburb of Indianapolis, The Village of WestClay is a Traditional Neighborhood Development (TND) in Indiana. Spread out on nearly 700 acres (2.8 km2), the Village features mostly single family custom estate homes. 160 acres (0.65 km2) are dedicated to parks and green space and there are nearly 10 miles (16 km) of walking trails.
